actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to provide Federal funding for the costs of operation and maintenance of waste treatment works.
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to authorize grants to any State, municipality, or intermunicipal or interstate agency for up to 25 percent of the annual costs of operation and maintenance of publicly owned treatment works.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to provide Federal funding for the costs of operation and maintenance of waste treatment works.
